title.rendered: CISCO employees from 6 cities paint shoes, gift happiness

content.rendered: Happiness means a little more when it’s shared. That’s what 250+ CISCO volunteers did by hand-painting shoes for children supported by Smile Foundation. In six cities – Bangalore, Pune, Delhi, Mumbai, Kolkata, and Chennai, they turned simple footwear into colorful expressions of love and creativity and gifted them to the children. For the children, these shoes were a special gift: personalized, thoughtful, and made just for them. A small gesture that brought big smiles!
